item.description:
NEW WORDPRESS USER GROUP SERIES:
Maximum 12 people reserve your spot now:

Collecting $6 for beer, beverages and pizza

Wordpress is not just a blog with templates (wordpress.com). It also offers a platform
for building a website, customizing themes and adding functionality (wordpress.org).

With years of WordPress development under our belts, we've decided it's time to share the knowledge! Come to the first of a series of workshops: for the first session we'll be setting up a sandbox for us to play with WordPress in, and answer your questions as we show you how to build a site from scratch.

Beer and WordPress: a match made in heaven.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: WordPress@Skytemple: WP101
